agot_destroy_building_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_08 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_08
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_07 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_07
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_06 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_06
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_05 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_05
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_04 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_04
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_03 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_03
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_02 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_02
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_01 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_01
	}
}

agot_destroy_tribal_building_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_02 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_02
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_01 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_01
	}
}

agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_06 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_06
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_05 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_05
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_04 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_04
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_03 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_03
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_02 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_02
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_01 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_01
	}
}

agot_destroy_four_level_building_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_04 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_04
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_03 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_03
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_02 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_02
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_01 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_01
	}
}

agot_destroy_one_level_building_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_building = $BUILDING$_01 }
		remove_building = $BUILDING$_01
	}
}

agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = {
	#Vanilla Castle
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = capital_bureau }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = hospices }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = curtain_walls }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = watchtowers }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = outposts }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = hill_forts }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = ramparts }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = farm_estates }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = cereal_fields }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = pastures }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = peat_quarries }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = hill_farms }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = logging_camps }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = plantations }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = quarries }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = orchards }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = elephant_pens }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = hunting_grounds }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = regimental_grounds }

	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = military_camps }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = camel_farms }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = stables }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = smiths }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = hillside_grazing }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = horse_pastures }

	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = qanats }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = murex_farm }

	#Vanilla Tribal
	agot_destroy_tribal_building_effect = { BUILDING = palisades }
	agot_destroy_tribal_building_effect = { BUILDING = war_camps }
	agot_destroy_tribal_building_effect = { BUILDING = longhouses }
	agot_destroy_tribal_building_effect = { BUILDING = market_villages }

	#Vanilla City
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = guild_halls }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = breweries }

	#Vanilla Church
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = scriptorium }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = monastic_schools }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = megalith }

	#AGOT Pirate
	agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_control }
	agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_economic }
	agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_supply }
	agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_troop }
	agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_military }
	agot_destroy_six_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_fortification }

	#AGOT Generic
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_slave_camps }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = building_moat }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = apiaries }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = godswood }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_urban_farms }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_steppe_farms }
	agot_destroy_building_effect = { BUILDING = agot_slave_camps }
	agot_destroy_four_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = city_walls }
	agot_destroy_one_level_building_effect = { BUILDING = generic_dragon_pit }
}

agot_add_buildings_on_start = {
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_crownlands = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_dragonstone = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_stormlands = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_dorne = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_reach = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_westerlands = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_iron_islands = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_riverlands = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_north = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_the_vale = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_first_forest = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_frostfangs = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_frozen_shore = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_ice_lakes = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_thenn = yes
	agot_add_building_on_start_wall = yes

	if = {
		limit = {
			agot_realm_three_daughters_enabled = yes
		}
		agot_add_building_on_start_stepstones = yes
		agot_add_building_on_start_tyrosh = yes
		agot_add_building_on_start_lys = yes
		agot_add_building_on_start_disputed_lands = yes
		agot_add_building_on_start_myr = yes
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			agot_realm_pentos_enabled = yes
		}
		agot_add_building_on_start_pentos = yes
		agot_add_building_on_start_andalos = yes
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			agot_realm_braavos_enabled = yes
		}
		agot_add_building_on_start_braavos = yes
	}
}

#The Crownlands
agot_add_building_on_start_the_crownlands = {
	province:4151 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7999.4.1
				game_start_date < 8026.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8026.1.1
				game_start_date < 8042.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8042.1.1
				game_start_date < 8045.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8045.1.1
				game_start_date < 8100.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8100.1.1
				game_start_date < 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8200.1.1
				game_start_date < 8300.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8300.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_02 }
		}
	}

			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = breweries_03 }
		}
		if = {

				game_start_date < 8130.1.1
			}

		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8000.1.1
				game_start_date < 8100.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = farm_estates_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_03 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8100.1.1
				game_start_date < 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = farm_estates_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_04 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = farm_estates_05 }

#Dragonstone
agot_add_building_on_start_dragonstone = {
	province:4415 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7686.1.1
				game_start_date < 7800.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7800.1.1
				game_start_date < 7887.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = smiths_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7887.1.1
				game_start_date < 7899.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = smiths_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7899.1.1
				game_start_date < 7974.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = smiths_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_03 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7974.1.1
				game_start_date < 8050.9.20
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = smiths_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_04 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8050.9.20
				game_start_date < 8131.1.28
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_06 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = smiths_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_05 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8131.1.28
				game_start_date < 8284.1.11
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_06 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = warrior_lodges_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = smiths_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = quarries_04 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8284.1.11
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_06 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_02 }

#The Riverlands
agot_add_building_on_start_the_riverlands ={
	province:1658 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = building_moat_05 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = godswood_02 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = watermills_05 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = military_camps_03 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = regimental_grounds_04 }
	}
	province:1659 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8000.1.1
				game_start_date < 8100.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = farm_estates_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_03 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8100.1.1
				game_start_date < 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = farm_estates_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_04 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = farm_estates_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_05 }
		}
	}
	province:1661 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8000.1.1
				game_start_date < 8100.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_farms_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8100.1.1
				game_start_date < 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_farms_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = guild_halls_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_farms_03 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = pastures_03 }
		}
	}
	province:1664 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes

		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = stables_03 }

#The Stepstones

	province:7294 = {

		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_control_06 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_military_06 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_economic_06 }
		agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_fortification_02 }
	}

			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_economic_06 }

				game_start_date >= 8098.1.1
				game_start_date < 8108.12.05

			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = hill_forts_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = common_tradeport_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = workshops_02 }
		}

				game_start_date >= 8108.12.05
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_control_06 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_pirate_economic_06 }

#Tyrosh
agot_add_building_on_start_tyrosh = {
	province:7351 = {
		agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7600.1.1
				game_start_date < 7700.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = capital_bureau_04 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_slave_camps_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = common_tradeport_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_urban_farms_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 7700.1.1
				game_start_date < 7800.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = capital_bureau_05 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_slave_camps_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = common_tradeport_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = agot_urban_farms_02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = common_tradeport_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_01 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = barracks_01 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				game_start_date >= 8100.1.1
				game_start_date < 8200.1.1
			}
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = curtain_walls_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = common_tradeport_02 }
			agot_add_building_if_possible = { BUILDING = cereal_fields_02 }

agot_add_camp_buildings_on_start = {
	title:d_laamp_merc_golden_company.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8212.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_02
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_01
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_01
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_smithy
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_the_stump
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8216.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_03
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_02
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_02
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_02
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_02
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_siege_engineers
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_mock_battle_drills
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8219.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_04
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_03
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_03
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_03
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_03
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_nightly_barding_drills
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8236.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_04
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_04
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_04
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_04
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_elephantry_reserve
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8258.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_05
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_05
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_05
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_05
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_brewers
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_arsenal
		}
	}
	title:d_laamp_Tall_1.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8209.1.29
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_02
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_perimeter_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_fire_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_perimeter_camp_hygiene
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_reserve_water
		}
	}
	title:d_laamp_blackfyre.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8196.6.2
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_02
			add_domicile_building = camp_perimeter_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_fire_01
			add_domicile_building = barber_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_fire_future_dreams
			add_domicile_building = camp_perimeter_good_siting
			add_domicile_building = barber_tent_surgeons_tools
		}
	}
	title:d_laamp_kingswood_brotherhood.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8277.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_02
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_perimeter_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_fire_01
			add_domicile_building = camp_perimeter_camp_hygiene
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_reserve_water
		}
	}
	title:d_laamp_merc_windblown.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8270.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_02
			add_domicile_building = mess_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_01
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_horse_run
		}
	}
	title:d_laamp_merc_company_of_the_cat.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8257.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_02
			add_domicile_building = barber_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_01
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_mock_battle_drills
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8270.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = camp_main_03
			add_domicile_building = barber_tent_02
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_02
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_02
			add_domicile_building = baggage_train_01
		}
	}
	title:d_laamp_merc_long_lances.holder.domicile ?= {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_domicile_type = camp
				game_start_date > 8280.1.1
			}
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_01
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_01
			add_domicile_building = proving_grounds_horse_run
			add_domicile_building = supply_tent_smithy
		}
	}
}

agot_add_wilderness_buildings_on_start = {
	title:c_wilderness.holder= {
		every_held_title = {
			title_tier = county
			title_province = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_holding_type = wilderness_holding }
					agot_destroy_all_generic_buildings = yes
					# Blocker Buildings post be added after lobby to avoid errors
					random_list = {
						1 = { }
						4 = {
							add_random_wilderness_blocker_building = yes
						}
						1 = {
							add_random_wilderness_blocker_building = yes
							add_random_wilderness_blocker_building = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
